content.raw:
Some of these goals are shared by the recently released DCP \(Distributed [Co-simulation](https://arxiv.org/abs/1702.00686) Protocol\) Standard, available at [https://itea3.org/project/workpackage/document/download/4882/DCP Specification 1.0-RC2](https://itea3.org/project/workpackage/document/download/4882/DCP%20Specification%201.0-RC2) .

I am not sure how much it is related, probably not a lot due to the different focus, but it may be interesting nevertheless.
content.html:
Some of these goals are shared by the recently released DCP (Distributed Co-simulation Protocol) Standard, available at https://itea3.org/project/workpackage/document/download/4882/DCP Specification 1.0-RC2 .

I am not sure how much it is related, probably not a lot due to the different focus, but it may be interesting nevertheless.
